title: 萨尔大学生存指南
text:
前言
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  住宿
text:
import folium

# 创建地图,以学校的坐标为中心
map = folium.Map(location=[49.2554, 7.0419], zoom_start=14)

# 添加标记
folium.Marker(
    location=[49.2600, 7.0450],
    popup=folium.Popup(html='<a href="dorm1.html">Dormitory 1</a>', max_width=200),
    tooltip='Click for more information'
).add_to(map)

folium.Marker(
    location=[49.2550, 7.0400],
    popup=folium.Popup(html='<a href="dorm2.html">Dormitory 2</a>', max_width=200),
    tooltip='Click for more information'
).add_to(map)

# 显示地图
map

Make this Notebook Trusted to load map: File -> Trust Notebook
